events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and their resume looks promising with extensive development experience.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on the candidateâ€™s experience with software development and devops tools.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the hiring process and to coordinate initial screening and interviews with the engineering team.
The recruiter completed the initial screening call and the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The candidate promptly responded to scheduling requests and confirmed availability for the technical interview next week.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the senior engineering panel for May 7th, focusing on software development skills and system design.
